```{r}
#| echo = FALSE
root <- rprojroot::is_rstudio_project
bib <- root$find_file(
  ".setup",
  "quarto",
  "bib",
  "quarto.bib"
)
X <- RefManageR::ReadBib(bib)
key <- names(X)
annotation <- lapply(X = X, function(x) x$annotation)
keywords <- lapply(X = X, function(x) x$keywords)
x <- cbind(
  key = key,
  annotation = annotation,
  keywords = keywords
)
# DT::datatable(x)
knitr::kable(x)
```
